resources.string: 2cloud
Preferences

string-array.name: edit_settings_array_descriptions
string-array.item: Change the account that you\'re using to send links.
Send links straight from your apps, without having to click Send in 2cloud.

resources.string: Can\'t make purchases
The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
Can\'t connect to Market
This app cannot connect to Market. Your version of Market may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
An unexpected error has occurred.
OK
Report Error
There was a problem retrieving the authentication results. Please try again.
You need to enter a link to send.
You need to specify a device to send the link to. If in doubt, try "Chrome".
There are no accounts set up. Please set one up before sending links.
You have accounts set up, but none is selected. Please select one before sending links.
You\'re trying to send something that has no link.
There was an error communicating with the server. Please try again.
There was an error authenticating you. Please check your account and try again.
The server is over quota. Your link has been stored, and will be opened tomorrow. If you wish, you may pay to get around the quota for the rest of the day.
There was a problem signing your request. Please try again.
There was a problem authenticating you. Please try again.
There was a problem signing your request. Please try again.
There was a problem communicating with the server. Please check your connection and try again.
There was a problem with your request. Please report this to the development team.
Error!

Select a link to send:
There was a problem contacting the host. We apologise for the issue, and are working on finding a fix. Please report this issue using the button below to assist us in fixing this bug.
The host you are using is no longer available. The account using it has been removed. Please add a new account.
It appears as though your device\'s time is set incorrectly. Please check your timezone, date, and time.
Open Date & Time Settings
There was a problem contacting the host. We apologise for the issue, and are working on finding a fix. Please report this issue using the button below to assist us in fixing this bug.
There was an error with your account. Please add it again to send links.
Add a New Account
